meanings.definition: A loudspeaker designed to reproduce low-pitched audio frequencies.
meanings.sent1: The subwoofers made the room shake with deep sounds.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy new subwoofers for my home theater system.
meanings.sent3: The subwoofers were so powerful, they made the cat jump!
meanings.sent4: His voice was like subwoofers, booming through the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The subwoofers thumped like a heartbeat, filling the space with music.

meanings.definition: A device used to enhance the bass sound in audio systems.
meanings.sent1: She adjusted the subwoofers to make the music more powerful.
meanings.sent2: The subwoofers in the car made the music sound amazing.
meanings.sent3: The subwoofers seemed to dance along with the beat of the song.
meanings.sent4: His words hit me like subwoofers, resonating deep within.
meanings.sent5: The subwoofers rumbled like thunder, adding depth to the music.
